alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 12:44PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Gadsden and northeastern Leon Counties through 130 PM EDT... At 1244 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Havana, moving east at 25 mph. At 1235PM EDT Quincy Airport measured a wind gust of 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Midway, Havana, Freemont, Macon Community Park, Littman, Miccosukee Road Greenway, Florence, Scotland, Jamieson, Fred George Park, Killearn Estates, Shady Rest, Lake Ella, Branchville, Hinson, Forest Meadows Park, Pisgah Church, Levy Park and Lake Iamonia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
